space.world

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • space.world.Entity
      • space.world.NonStationary
        • space.world.Character
          • space.world.Player
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ViewableNonStationary, ViewableObject, ViewablePlayer

    public class Player
extends Character
implements ViewablePlayer
    Represents a player in the game
